12.SummaryEnglish: Tama, Tatsumi, Tetsuko, Kozen, Madao, Kyoshiro. Everybody is out in full force to fight for the Kabuki District. Male escorts vs. trannies, Cabaret girls vs. Yakuza, robots blowing things up. It’s an all-out war!

13.SummaryEnglish: Jirocho and Gin battle Kada's elite Harusame forces while the rest of the denizens of Kabuki-cho take on her main forces in the streets. Kada is utterly stunned when her elite forces are beat by just these two humans, and flees the scene. Gin then helps Jirocho resolve his issues regarding Tatsugoro; Otose and Jirocho reconcile at the hospital. Outside the hospital, Kada desperately launches one last feeble attempt at conquering Kabuki-cho, but is stopped in her tracks by Pirako and the Yorozuya - Kada settles for swearing that the Harusame will be back, and flees yet again. At the very end, Jirocho denounces all other names he has ever been called except for Father of Pirako, and goes with his daughter back to the country.

14.SummaryEnglish: Kagura's older brother, Kamui, visits Kada's cell where she is being kept after having been captured by the Kiheitai and loses at a game of odds or evens. He is approached by one of the 12 captains who tells him he has the 12 captains support if he chooses to overthrow Admiral Abo. Kamui orders his second to kill the members of the Kiheitai, isolating Takasugi so Kamui can duel him. As the Kiheitai's ship is about to be attacked the Admiral double crosses Kamui and imprisons him out of fear. Takasugi visits Kada's cell and loses at a game of odds or evens. After a brief conversation Takasugi rescues Kamui at his execution, overthrowing Admiral Abo. Kamui becomes Admiral and the episode ends with Takasugi visiting Kada's cell one last time to lose at a game of odds or evens.

15.TitleEnglish: I Can't Remember a Damn Thing About the Factory Tour
15.SummaryEnglish: Kagura invites a bunch of kids to the Yorozuya. They, along with other characters get shunned by them and invites them into a "factory tour".

16.TitleEnglish: What Happen Twice Can Happen Thrice
16.SummaryEnglish: Gintoki and Hasegawa have to help the shogun when he is at the pool

17.TitleEnglish: The Pincers of Crab Can Snip Through a Friendship
17.SummaryEnglish: Otose sent a box of crab to the Yoruzuya. Before they can divide the crab's legs to themselves, suddenly, there came a blackout after the electricity came back one leg is missing and Gintoki ate it. Another blackout came and another leg was missing and Kagura ate it, saying she was attacked by a gorilla. Shinpachi then put up a candle. Then Gintoki and Kagura ate all of the legs. When Shinpachi claims the crab's whole body they found themselves fighting for a crab congee and ended up eating crab-flavored cheap food.

18.TitleEnglish: People Forget to Return Stuff All the Time Without Even Realizing It
18.SummaryEnglish: Kagura helps a iwamatsu, the last part have the yoruzuya and shinsengumi in the bathhouse just as neighbor Hedero arrives with family members visiting Edo.

19.TitleEnglish: The Bathhouse, Where You're Naked in Body and Soul
19.SummaryEnglish: Gin, Kondo, Hijkata, and Shin are stuck in the public bath with the demons. Every lie they tell digs their grave deeper. Can they really get away with kicking heads in, ripping off horns, and setting demons on fire with lotion?

20.SummaryEnglish: The monkey, aka "Jugem Jugem... (abbreviated) Runny Diarrhea," has grown close to Kyubei. However, their time together did not last. The Shogun family ordered that the Yagyu return Runny Diarrhea. The monkey escapes from the Shogun family to see Kyubei again. Kyubei and the other Yagyu members are forced to continue a desperate and fruitless search for Runny Diarrhea.

22.TitleEnglish: The Man's Household Situation Is Hard , His Heart Is Soft
22.SummaryEnglish: Katsura infiltrates Matsudaira's household and ends up pondering family values.

23.SummaryEnglish: The Yorozuya run into a mysterious Blu-ray DVD with a depressed female ghost in it. The ghost moves into their TV, making all the programs gloomy as well. Gintoki then attempts to find use for the ghost as a navigator.

24.TitleEnglish: So in the Second Season of Prison Break, They Already Broke Out of Prison, But the Name Works When You Realize That Society Is a Prison
24.SummaryEnglish: Gintoki gets thrown in prison after being framed, and while he's made an enemy of the warden, he's managed to become the boss of the prisoners. With his underling Shachi in tow, Gintoki skips his menial labor duties to search the warden's room for anything incriminating. Understanding that the punishment will be fatal if they are caught, Gintoki disguises himself by putting on pajamas…

25.SummaryEnglish: Gintoki continues creating havoc in the prison.

26.TitleEnglish: Speaking Of Crossovers , Don't Forget About Alien Vs Predator
26.SummaryEnglish: Gintama meets Sket Dance! But not without trouble...

27.TitleEnglish: Love Is Neither Plus Nor Minus
27.SummaryEnglish: Shinpachi introduces his new girlfriend to Otae… but she turns out to be Momo-san, a character from the popular Love Choris game. There are more and more boys in Edo who can no longer distinguish game from reality like Shinpachi. Otae asks Gintoki to bring Shinpachi back to the real world. The only way is by entering the world of Love Choris and talking some sense into him. Gintoki ends up choosing a very unique heroine to be his girlfriend…

28.SummaryEnglish: Gintoki challenges Shinpachi in the ultimate Love Chorus tournament in order to break his illusion of his virtual girlfriend.

29.TitleEnglish: It Would Take Too Much Effort to Make This Title Sound Like a Text Message Subject
29.SummaryEnglish: Kagura wants a mobile phone of her own in order to be able to text with her friends. Her wish is granted, and she starts harassing Gintoki and Shinpachi through text messaging.

30.TitleEnglish: When You Go to a Funeral for the First Time, You're Surprised By How Happy the People Are
30.SummaryEnglish: The Shinsengumi and the Yorozuya attend the funeral of a close udon shop owner. Instead of moving on, however, the soul of the old man is overseeing the ceremony.

31.TitleEnglish: The People You Tend to Forget Tend to Show Up After You Forget Them
31.SummaryEnglish: Katsura visit Yorozuya with a Elizabeth's placard to solve the mystery of Elizabeth's disappearance. But the investigation only reveals a shocking truth.

32.TitleEnglish: The Legendary Mercenary Tribe, Renho.  Elizabeth Was in Fact, One of Those White Demons
32.SummaryEnglish: The Yorozuya and Katsura follow Elizabeth to stop the Renho from taking over the earth.

33.SummaryEnglish: The Yorozuya, Katsura, and Sakamoto disguise themselves as Renho and infiltrate their base.

34.SummaryEnglish: Elizabeth and Dark Vader battle to the death and just when things are not looking so good for Elizabeth, Katsura shows up to save his friend.

35.TitleEnglish: Goodbye Lionel, Why Don't You Say Something!
35.SummaryEnglish: The Renho join forces with Sakamoto and the Yorozuya against Dark Vader and their home planet in order to bring peace to the universe.

36.SummaryEnglish: The Shinsengumi are forced to guard the Shogun on his first snowboarding trip, but they run into the Yorozuya and mayhem ensues.

37.SummaryEnglish: Everybody's stranded in the middle of the mountains. To make things worse, the Shogun goes missing.

38.TitleEnglish: There Are Some Things You Should Not Forget When Drinking Away the Past Year at Year-End Parties
38.SummaryEnglish: It's a year-end party at Odd Jobs! The Gintama anime has been through a lot, but Gintoki tells Kagura and Shinpachi to keep it cool. And then the usual members join in for some real partying... The next morning, Gintoki wakes up to discover that he's made some very bad mistakes. Will Gin-san be able to survive the worst blunder in five years of Gintama!?

39.TitleEnglish: People Can Only Live By Forgetting the Bad
39.SummaryEnglish: After getting drunk at the year-end party, Gintoki managed to become a six-timer in one night. In order to prevent the show from being pulled off the air, Gintoki is forced into engaging in a relationship with all of them. And now he has to go on dates with all of them at the same time...!

40.TitleEnglish: We Are All Hosts, in Capital Letters
40.SummaryEnglish: The number one host in the Kabuki district, Kyoshiro, summons the Odd Jobs members to his club, Takamagahara, and tells them that he intends to quit because of a lady named Madame Yagami who controls the night world. It seems that she declared she would be making a second visit to Takamagahara, which is essentially a death sentence. The hosts at Kyoshiro's have quit out of fear, so Gintoki and co must find hosts to handle the Madame...

41.TitleEnglish: Girls like Vegeta, Guys like Piccolo
41.SummaryEnglish: The Madame's arrival is imminent. Kyoshiro, Gintoki, and friends attempt to scout some help, but they end up with a bunch of oddballs. And it turns out that Otae has invited guests from all over town who go wild and leave the bar and Kyoshiro broken! There's no time to worry about taking care of customers. But at the worst possible time, Madame Yagami arrives!

42.TitleEnglish: Draw Your Life on the Canvas We Call Manga
42.SummaryEnglish: Jellybeans Vanguard Honda is on his fifth year as a Jump editor. However, he's been assigned to the manga Gintaman, which has driven multiple editors insane. In order to save himself, Honda must find a new talented artist so he can be reassigned. One day, he is visited by an aspiring manga artist by the name of N3016. Is this artist as juvenile as his name suggests?

43.SummaryEnglish: The Sasaki family is as elite as it gets, and one of its members, Tetsunosuke, has joined the Shinsengumi. He would have joined the Mimawarigumi, a police force with pedigree, but he is considered a troublemaker, which is why he was sent to the Shinsengumi. Kondo assigns Tetsu to Hijikata as an assistant, so Hijikata is forced to endure the new recruit...

44.SummaryEnglish: Tetsunosuke has completely changed as he sincerely tries to perform his new job. Isaburo despises Tetsunosuke and tells Hijikata that he should dispose of him, but Hijikata, who came from a similar background, sympathizes with Tetsunosuke and looks after him. Meanwhile, Gintoki, who was arrested by the Mimawarigumi, has been assigned a mission by Isaburo...

45.SummaryEnglish: Tetsunosuke has been ordered to deliver a letter for Hijikata. However, he's captured by the radical Joi Check It Out gang in the process. Tetsunosuke had concealed his identity to join the gang, but now they know that he has connections to the police. He's taken hostage as leverage over the Shinsengumi and Mimawarigumi. However, the Mimawarigumi shows no concern for the hostage and plots to place the blame squarely on the Shinsengumi. Hijikata and the other members are enraged after learning Isaburo's plans. The Shinsengumi and Mimawarigumi are now in an all-out fight.

46.SummaryEnglish: The Shinsengumi attempt to save Tetsunosuke from the Check It Out gang, but the Mimawarigumi stands in the way. Neither side is willing to back down, but Gintoki, who had infiltrated the gang as a Mimawarigumi spy, manages to save Tetsunosuke! Kondo orders the Shinsengumi to begin fighting back!

47.SummaryEnglish: The middle-aged dumb-ass oldie, or Madao, Taizo Hasegawa finds himself on a game show with a chance to win ten million yen. Will he be able to endure the pressure and become a Madaonaire!? And what is Madao's motivation for participating in the game show...?

48.TitleEnglish: Presents Are Meant to Be Given Early
48.SummaryEnglish: A character from 2 years ago is back with a request for Gin. This favor will take the Odd-Job Trio right in the middle of Satan Festival in this very special Christmas episode.

49.TitleEnglish: New Year's Envelopes Are Perfect for Dirty Jokes
49.SummaryEnglish: Gin is trying to hand out New Year Envelopes but the lack of children characters make it hard. To make matters worse, everyone seems to have their mind wrapped around long cylindrical objects and small spherical objects.

50.TitleEnglish: When Sleeping Under a Kotatsu, Make Sure You Don't Burn Your Balls
50.SummaryEnglish: Nobody cares anymore, the animators, producers, not even Hideaki Sorachi. Aww, it’s such a drag even the characters are airing their grievances. Where do we go from here?

51.SummaryEnglish: Its last episode and Gintama' is going out with a bang. A Gintama clip show!

6.SummaryEnglish: Während Gintoki Sakata weg war, haben die Yorozuya einen neuen Anführer gefunden: Kintoki, Gintokis goldhaarige Doppelgängerin. Um seine frühere Position zurückzuerobern, braucht Gintoki die Hilfe der Menschen um ihn herum - ein schwieriges Unterfangen, wenn sich niemand mehr an ihn erinnern kann! Wer von beiden, Kintoki und Gintoki, wird den Thron als Hauptfigur besteigen?

1.TitleEnglish: Nobody with Natural Straight Hair Can Be That Bad
1.SummaryEnglish: Gintoki returns from a six-month vacation to find he has been replaced by a gold-haired imposter.

2.SummaryEnglish: Tama reveals Kintoki's origins and hatches a plan with Gintoki and Sadaharu to make the town remember the real Odd Jobs leader.

3.SummaryEnglish: After Gintoki saves Tama from Kintoki, he finds the whole town turned against him after Kintoki frames him for the attack! Now Gintoki must face not only Kintoki, but all his former friends too! However, some of them are beginning to have doubts.

4.TitleEnglish: The Meaning of a Main Character
4.SummaryEnglish: It's time for the final showdown. Gintoki's friends rally around him once more, but Kintoki still has one more trick up his sleeve that could spell the end of Gintama forever!

5.SummaryEnglish: Many years ago, the famous courtesan Suzuran made a promise with one of her clients. She has waiting in Yoshiwara ever since, hoping meet this man again. Many years have passed and Suzuran is now old and on her deathbed. Gintoki and Tsukuyo decide to track down this man, but are shocked when they find out just who he is.

6.SummaryEnglish: Whilst trying to hide the unconscious Shogun, Gintoki and the gang encounter his uncle, the former Shogun, the man who allegedly made the promise with Suzuran. However, when Tsukuyo asks about her, they discover something that could spell danger for them all.

7.SummaryEnglish: Gintoki and the gang storm the palace looking for Maizo and Sadasada, the former Shogun. They find and confront Sadasada, but he still has a few tricks up his sleeve...

8.SummaryEnglish: Just when it looks like all is lost, the Shinsengumi and Mimawarigumi arrive to lend their aid to our heroes. Sadasada attempts to escape but Gintoki is hot in pursuit.

9.SummaryEnglish: As the Tendoshu arrive to take control of the situation, Shigeshige makes an unexpected announcement. Later, things have finally calmed down, but one question still remains; Will Suzuran finally meet her beloved after all these years?

10.TitleEnglish: The Sound of a Beam Can Pierce Every Heart
10.SummaryEnglish: Otae has decided that it's finally time to re-open the dojo to new students. Shortly after deciding this, she and Shinpachi meet with an unexpected acquaintance from the past. His name is Hajime, a former student of the dojo who was missing, assumed dead after being caught in an explosion in the terminal. Now that he has returned, he will help them revive the dojo, however there is something different about him.

11.SummaryEnglish: Hajime's secret is revealed and the fate of the world hangs in the balance. Gintoki, seemingly ignoring Otae's pleas, decides to settle the score with Hajime himself.

12.TitleEnglish: Liquor and Gasoline, Smiles and Tears
12.SummaryEnglish: Shinpachi arrives and saves Gintoki at the last moment. Although Gintoki was trying to save Hajime, Shinpachi and Otae have now resolved to put an end to this no matter what.

13.TitleEnglish: Dog Food Doesn't Taste Like You Think
13.SummaryEnglish: Sadaharu, fed up with the lack of food at Odd Jobs, decides to leave to fend for himself. On the way he meets a starving puppy that he can't ignore.

7.SummaryEnglish: Gintoki, Shinpachi und Kagura kehren als die lebenslustigen, aber pleite gegangenen Mitglieder des Yorozuya-Teams zurück! Sie leben in einer alternativen Realität in Edo, in der Schwerter verboten sind und außerirdische Herrscher Japan erobert haben, und versuchen, sich mit jeder Arbeit durchzuschlagen, die sie in die Finger bekommen. Aber Shinpachi und Kagura haben immer noch kein Geld bekommen... Gibt Gin-chan wirklich so viel Geld fürs Pachinko-Spielen aus?

1.TitleEnglish: You Can Never Pause at the Perfect Time
1.SummaryEnglish: Gin finds a strange clock and accidentally breaks it, causing all time in the universe to come to a stop.

2.TitleEnglish: Even a Matsui Stick Can't Handle Some Kinds of Dirt
2.SummaryEnglish: Odd Jobs continue to try and fix the Universal Clock, with little success.

3.TitleEnglish: An Inspector's Love Begins With an Inspection
3.SummaryEnglish: Yamazaki is on the verge of breaking down after staking out Odd Jobs' place for days on end. Tama offers some words of encouragement at just the right moment. Unfortunately, Yamazaki's new found affection for Tama soon turns into full-blown stalking. Concerned, the Shinsengumi send Okita to help fix things...

4.TitleEnglish: Forget Dates, Remember People / You Can Hide Your Porn Mags, But You Can't Hide Your ***
4.SummaryEnglish: Part 1 - Tsukuyo attempts to give Seita history lessons, but he refuses to take it seriously. Gintoki attempts to help, but his version of events may not be very accurate. Part 2 - Shinpachi runs into Gintoki whilst attempting to smuggle "Ho Love-ru" manga. The pair discuss how best to hide them from his sister.

5.TitleEnglish: A Mirror Provides a Frozen Reflection of Both Your Beautiful and Ugly Sides / Nobody Likes the Photo on Their License
5.SummaryEnglish: Part 1 - Sacchan finds a new stalking spot in Odd Job's building, but witnesses some unexpected things as the gang go about their morning rituals! Part 2 - Yamazaki is fed up with being labelled as boring at work and tries to get a ninja license.

6.TitleEnglish: Arriving Late to a Reunion Makes it Hard to Enter
6.SummaryEnglish: Gin is tricked into turning up to a reunion party with Katsura and Sakamoto. The two are unhappy with their lack of screen time and are determined to start a flashback arc, but they then get sidetracked trying to figure out the identity of a supposed fifth hero who supported them from the sidelines.

7.TitleEnglish: A Reunion Also Brings to the Surface Things You Don't Want to Remember
7.SummaryEnglish: Gin and co finally remember the phantom fifth member, Kurokono Tasuke. They also remember blowing him up by accident! Could it be that this reunion was arranged by Kurokono's vengeful spirit?

8.TitleEnglish: When Compared to Time in the Heavens, Fifty Years of Human Life Resembles Naught but Dreams and Lottery Tickets
8.SummaryEnglish: Whilst buying his cigarettes, Hijikata is persuaded to take a lottery ticket someone left behind. Against all the odds, it's the jackpot winner! Hijikata becomes paranoid that somebody knows he has the ticket and then bumps into the last person he wants to see!

9.TitleEnglish: Guys With Big Nostrils Also Have Big Imaginations / You Never Accept a New Sentai Series at the Start, But By the Final Episode, You Don't Want It to End
9.SummaryEnglish: Part 1 - Odd Jobs discuss ways to advertise themselves to attract new customers. Part 2 - Now that the previous four Devas have retired, the new leaders try to think of ways to make the Kabuki District less intimidating after being ranked the "least desirable place to live".

10.SummaryEnglish: Chaos ensues in the Kabuki district after a fanatical cult swaps everyone's genders around.

11.TitleEnglish: Calories Come Back to Bite You Just When You've Forgotten About Them
11.SummaryEnglish: Odd Jobs and the Shinsengumi (F) team up to overthrow the cult, but Kyubei starts to question whether he/she wants to turn back into a woman.

12.SummaryEnglish: The gang break into the cult's headquarters but the leaders have already escaped. Faced with the possibility of never changing back, everyone must now adjust to their new genders.

13.TitleEnglish: All Mothers Pack Too Much Food Into a Lunch Box and Ruin the Shape
13.SummaryEnglish: Concerned that Seita doesn't seem to be making friends at temple school, Hinowa and Tsukuyo, believing the problem to lie with his lunch box, attempt to fix the problem but only seem to make it worse.

14.TitleEnglish: The Reaper by Day and the Reaper by Night
14.SummaryEnglish: Recently, there has been a bizarre string of murders around town. The victims have all been killed the same way, with their heads virtually severed, bar a small strand of flesh. Gintoki, whilst stumbling home drunk, encounters what appears to be a reaper who asks him to help with their ritual suicide. He will soon discover just how the two are related.

15.SummaryEnglish: After revealing that his name was among the criminals sentenced to be executed, Yaemon blackmails Gin into smuggling Asaemon to safety. Meanwhile, Hijikata and Okita follow up their own leads on the reaper, uncovering a greater conspiracy in the process.

16.SummaryEnglish: Asaemon confronts Yaemon, but after he reveals that it was Gintoki who was the reason for her father's death, her resolve waivers. Will her blade strike Yaemon or Gintoki?

17.TitleEnglish: A Phoenix Rises from the Ashes  Over and Over
17.SummaryEnglish: Hasegawa come to Odd Jobs looking for new ghost stories to scare kids in the park. Unfortunately, the scariest thing about these stories might be the copyright laws they're breaking!

18.SummaryEnglish: Gintoki notices that many drunken patrons of Otose's bar are confessing their sins to Tama and decides to take advantage of that by opening a confessional and taking a cut of the fees. Many of the confessions seem to mention a certain worthless boss who sounds very familiar!

19.SummaryEnglish: After the previous episode's escapades, Katsura finds the unconscious Shigeshige and takes him back to the Joi Rebels hideout. Shigeshige has lost his memories of being the Shogun, but everyone but Katsura recognizes him straight away! Katsura, seeing potential in Shigeshige as a natural-born leader, attempts to teach him the qualities of leadership, but ends up being one-upped by him!

20.SummaryEnglish: After inviting Otae to the festival and being rejected, Kondo rampages around, taking his frustrations out on happy couples there. In an effort to hide the fact that the one making the scene is the Shinsengumi chief, Sougo and Hijikata convince him to wear a disguise. A short while later, Kondo runs into Otae, who doesn't seem to recognize him in his cockroach mask.

21.TitleEnglish: A Sizzle Summer / A Nothing Summer 2015
21.SummaryEnglish: Part 1 - After being told by Gin and Shinpachi that part of the joy of eating watermelons is the "drama" that comes with them, Kagura and Princess Soyo decide to raise the stakes. Part 2 - Summer break is almost over and Seita has not done his homework! He goes to Odd Jobs for help but as usual gets more than he bargained for!

22.TitleEnglish: He's the Sweet Tooth, and I'm the Mayo Guy
22.SummaryEnglish: After getting hit by a truck, Gin and Hijikata mysteriously switch bodies. Now they must adapt to living each other's lives while trying to find a way to switch back.

23.TitleEnglish: I'm a Failure as a Leader, and He's Also a Failure as a Leader
23.SummaryEnglish: Gin and Hijikata find Gengai, who's newest invention is responsible for their body swapping. He tries to reverse the process but it doesn't work as something is missing. Gin remembers that part of his soul ended up in a dead cat which they must now find. Unfortunately, the Shinsengumi, with their new found freedom, and Odd Jobs, with their new strict codes, seem intent on getting in their way.

24.TitleEnglish: I'm Odd Jobs, and He's Shinsengumi
24.SummaryEnglish: Gin and Hijikata manage to track down the cat with part of Gin's soul in it, which is being looked after by Otae. Attempts to capture it are complicated when the rest of the gang turn up and have also swapped bodies!

25.TitleEnglish: Always Leave Enough Room for Fifty Million in Your Bag
25.SummaryEnglish: Mutsu recalls to Gin how she and Sakamoto first became acquainted.

26.TitleEnglish: Always Leave Enough Room for Pebbles in Your Bag
26.SummaryEnglish: Sakamoto has been kidnapped by the pirates they double-crossed in the past! Now, it's up to Mutsu and Gin to rescue him.

27.TitleEnglish: Style Goes Out of Fashion the Moment It's Put Into Words / There Are Two Types of People In This World: Those Who Yell Out Their Attack Names, and Those Who Don't
27.SummaryEnglish: Part 1 - The Odd Jobs trio try out different outfits and styles, with disastrous consequences. Part 2 - Facing a disinterested group of old bums at their Dojo, Shinpachi asks the others for help in motivating them. They discover a scroll left behind by his dad containing a secret ultimate move.

28.SummaryEnglish: Whilst out "patrolling" Tae's house, Kondo encounters a notorious thief known as Ape Boy. Sensing his Gorilla-like strength and agility, Ape Boy asks Kondo to become his disciple.

29.SummaryEnglish: Katsura attempts to infiltrate the Shinsengumi wearing an afro as a disguise. He gets more than he bargained for when he is assigned to the squad of another Afro-wearer with some serious social issues!

30.SummaryEnglish: Zura, having successfully infiltrated the Shinsengumi, now attempts to get rid of Wolfro, deeming him a threat.

31.TitleEnglish: Take the Initial Premise Lightly, and It'll Cost You
31.SummaryEnglish: Whilst on a job tailing someone in the blistering summer heat, Gin steals Kagura's parasol, forgetting that the Yato are weak against sunlight. Kagura falls ill and is taken to the hospital.

32.SummaryEnglish: Kagura's ruse has gone too far! After faking her illness things take a turn for the worse as everyone assumes she is dying. Even Soyo turns up and ends up planning a state funeral for her. It looks like it's too late for Kagura to correct the misunderstanding now!

33.TitleEnglish: One Editor Is Enough / The G-Pen Is Capricious and the Maru Pen Is Stubborn
33.SummaryEnglish: Part 1 - After faking a stomachache to work on his Manga in peace in the infirmary, Shachi's work is discovered by the nurse there, who likes it a lot! Shachi wants to try asking her out but doesn't know how to. Gin suggests he do it through his Manga. Part 2 - Gin and Shachi finally get a chance to debut in Jump, however they only have one night to finish their manuscript! Gin finds some assistants to help. Will they finish in time?

34.TitleEnglish: Strike When the Sword and Overlord are Hot / Oil Rain
34.SummaryEnglish: Part 1 - Tetsuko leaves Odd Jobs in charge of her store while she looks for rare materials. It doesn't take long before some strange characters appear asking for various legendary swords to be fixed. Part 2 - Tama befriends an cigarette vending machine that has become unreliable due to its age. Over time, the two become closer, but their happy days may be numbered.

35.SummaryEnglish: After the Shogun nearly falls victim to an assassination attempt by unknown forces, a plan is put into motion to help him escape Edo. Several diversions, each with body doubles set off in different directions, guarded by those loyal to Shigeshige. However the loyalty of some remains uncertain...

36.SummaryEnglish: Zenzou and the Iga clan have betrayed the Shogun! Their forces are ambushed from all sides as forces loyal to the shogun desperately fight back.

37.SummaryEnglish: After it becomes clear that the Iga clan didn't actually betray the Shogun, Gin and co are taken to their village and learn the truth about the Shogun's deep involvement with the clan in the past.

38.SummaryEnglish: As Sarutobi attempts to rescue the critically wounded Zenzou, Odd Jobs, Hijikata and Kondou desparately fight back against the ruthless Yato clan, trying to get the Shogun to safety. Meanwhile, Takasugi seeks out Gintoki to end things once and for all.

39.TitleEnglish: Those Who Protect Against All Odds
39.SummaryEnglish: Past histories are finally confronted for Gintoki and Kagura as they face off against Takasugi and Kamui.

40.SummaryEnglish: As Gintoki and Takasugi continue their frenzied fight, the past they shared together with Katsura is revealed, as well as the fate of their teacher, Shouyou.

41.TitleEnglish: The Crows Caw After the Battle Ends
41.SummaryEnglish: As various conflicts draw to their conclusions, the Tendoshu swoop in to finish off the survivors.

42.SummaryEnglish: With the battle over, the survivors each go their separate ways. With Nobunobu appointed the new Shogun, Shigeshige and his retainers retreat to Kyo to regroup. For those left in Edo, there may be dark times ahead.

43.SummaryEnglish: Following Shigeshige's assassination, the new Shogun, Nobunobu begins a purge of the old guard. Matsudaira and Kondo are blamed for failing to prevent the assassination and sentenced to be beheaded and the Shingengumi are disbanded. Lost and without a leader, they must now decide what to do next.

44.SummaryEnglish: Gin and Hijikata are drinking away their sorrows when Nobunobu and the Mimawarigumi storm the place. Nobunobu, not satisfied with having crushed Shigeshige and thei Shinsengumi attempts to antagonize Hijikata. Suddenly, an unexpected ally arrives.

45.SummaryEnglish: Whilst Kondo And Katsura attempt to break out of prison, Hijikata must decide which path to walk.

46.SummaryEnglish: The Shinsengumi and Joi Rebels team up to rescue Kondo and Katsura from the prison island known as Kokujo, but things do not go to plan and they are soon ambushed by a familiar enemy.

47.SummaryEnglish: Odd Jobs and the Shinsengumi make land on the prison island, but to reach Kondo and Katsura they must content with the Tendoshu and the Mimawarigumi first.

48.SummaryEnglish: Sasaki Isaburo's past with the Shinsengumi, Matsudaira, and Imai Nobume is finally revealed.

49.SummaryEnglish: Things come to a head on Kokujo Island, as death itself descends upon the battlefield.

50.SummaryEnglish: With everyone fighting to regroup and escape, Sasaki makes the same mistake one more time.

51.SummaryEnglish: The complete fallout of the events at Kokujo Island come to light and brings about farewells nobody thought they'd ever see.

8.SummaryEnglish: Nachdem sie sich dem Widerstand gegen die Bakufu angeschlossen haben, verstecken sich Gintoki und die Bande, zusammen mit Katsura und seinen Joui-Rebellen. Bald wird der Yorozuya von Nobume Imai und zwei Mitgliedern der Kiheitai angesprochen, die ihm erklären, dass sich die Harusame-Piraten gegen den Kapitän der 7. Die Kiheitai erteilen Gintoki einen Auftrag: Er soll Takasugi finden, der vermisst wird, seit sein Schiff bei einem Harusame-Überfall in einen Hinterhalt geraten ist. Nobume macht auch eine verblüffende Enthüllung über die Tendoushuu, eine geheime Organisation, die die Fäden zahlreicher Fraktionen zieht, und ihren Anführer Utsuro, eine schattenhafte Gestalt mit einer verblüffenden Ähnlichkeit zu Gintokis ehemaligem Lehrer.

1.TitleEnglish: The Monster and the Monster's Child
1.SummaryEnglish: Gintama kicks off its late-night airing with Odd Jobs "hiding" in Akiba. That's when they get a visitor with a request...

2.SummaryEnglish: When they learn the truth about the current situation, the gang realize that they must go into battle. And so, too, does Kagura.

3.SummaryEnglish: Tensions heighten on Rakuyo as several factions arrive on the scene and confront one another.

4.SummaryEnglish: Kotarou's nickname is "Kotarou the Runner". He's a master of defensive battles, and minimizing losses when things turn bad. His quiet, unassuming nature and the way he fights make him less likely to stand out than his other friends. However, if he was put up against a real foe, someone who he couldn't beat unless he gave up on running, you might just learn his true name...

5.SummaryEnglish: The Kaientai fleet comes under attack from the Harusame division without any troops. Can Sakamoto, Mutsu, and Nobunobu get out of this alive?

6.SummaryEnglish: Gintoki comes across a man who has waited over a decade to exact his revenge on him. The question is, does he really have the right guy?

7.SummaryEnglish: The Joi Elite Four come together once again at last, with explosive results.

8.SummaryEnglish: As Umibozu faces Utsuro, he recalls the strongest enemy he has ever faced: someone you can find in every corner of the universe.

9.SummaryEnglish: As the battle between Utsuro and Umibozu comes to a head, Kamui reflects on his childhood, where he had to deal with an increasingly sick mother and an increasingly absent father.

10.SummaryEnglish: Kagura, Gintoki, and Shinpachi take a stand against Kamui, hoping to bring his true self back.

11.SummaryEnglish: As the gang comes to grips with the aftermath of the battle with Kamui, a familiar figure appears before Takasugi and the Kiheitai.

12.SummaryEnglish: Oboro tells the students of Shoka Sonjuku the truth about Utsuro and his ultimate goal.

9.SummaryEnglish: Nach den düsteren Ereignissen von Iga, der Insel Kokujou, Rakuyou und mehreren erfolglosen Konfrontationen mit den Tenshouin Naraku und Tendoshuu nimmt Gintama: Porori-hen die Zuschauer mit auf eine Reise in die Vergangenheit, als die Yorozuya noch das taten, was sie am besten konnten - seltsame Jobs. Der große Weltraumjäger Umibouzu ist nach Edo zurückgekehrt und ist außer sich, als er erfährt, dass seine Tochter Kagura einen Freund hat. Er wirft Gintoki vor, ein unfähiger Vormund zu sein, aber ist es für ihn endlich an der Zeit, seine Tochter loszulassen?

1.TitleEnglish: The Stairs to Adulthood May Not Always Lead Up
1.SummaryEnglish: Umibozu drops in to visit Kagura, but he and Gintoki get the shock of their lives when Kagura reveals she has a boyfriend now.

2.TitleEnglish: My Bald Dad, My Light-Haired Dad, and My Dad's Glasses
2.SummaryEnglish: Umibozu and Gintoki's meeting with Kagura's boyfriend Dai doesn't go according to plan as he's revealed to be the prince of Planet Titan. Meanwhile, the new couple's relationship takes a drastic turn.

3.SummaryEnglish: Katsura, upon hearing Ikumatsu's story about an old man who used to visit her restaurant every New Year's Eve, enlists the Odd Jobs' help to look for him.

4.SummaryEnglish: The gang discover the truth behind the old man and look to reunite him with Ikumatsu and her ramen.

5.TitleEnglish: Life, Death, and Shades / All the Answers Can Be Found in the Field
5.SummaryEnglish: Hasegawa has a life-or-death encounter with assassins, and the Shinsengumi and Mimawarigumi compete over solving a fictional case.

6.TitleEnglish: 3000 Leagues in Search of a Scabbard
6.SummaryEnglish: The Odd Jobs encounter a strange sword at Tetsuko's smithy, and it grows attached (quite literally) to Gintoki's behind!

7.TitleEnglish: The Super Sadist and the Super Sadist
7.SummaryEnglish: Kusanagi reveals the details of an old wound he received at the hands of the cursed sword, Maganagi, as Gintoki and Okita get ready for their duel. Meanwhile, Hijikata investigates Senbe the Manslayer.

8.TitleEnglish: The Strongest Sword,  and the Dullest Ass
8.SummaryEnglish: The Excaliburling story reaches its climax as Maganagi takes over Okita's body and reveals the truth to Kusanagi. How will Gintoki respond?

9.TitleEnglish: Wash Your Hands Before a Handshake
9.SummaryEnglish: As group units take over the idol industry, Terakado Tsu must adapt or fall behind the times. But the idol she forms a combo unit with is... Kagura?

10.SummaryEnglish: Boogie Diamonds 48 has to deal with the sudden arrival of Galaxy Kingdom Bitches 48, who challenge them for the spot of Edo's top idol!

11.SummaryEnglish: The battle at the Oedo Dome heats up as the fans waver between the two groups, but Otsu is still holed up indoors. Will she fade away, or will Shinpachi and gang rekindle her passion?

12.TitleEnglish: The Line Between Godlike Games and Shitty Games is Paper-Thin
12.SummaryEnglish: In the first half, Gintoki decides that as protagonist, he can't sit and do nothing as a Gintama game is released. He takes matters into his own hands as Odd Jobs looks to produce a super hit. In the second, Shinpachi buys a new pair of glasses that get him rather high spirits...

13.TitleEnglish: Guardian Spirits Are Also a Part of the Soul
13.SummaryEnglish: The Kabuki District Sports Meet begins, and Shinpachi bears witness to the influence guardian spirits have on such events. Will he be able to fight through it and help Odd Jobs win the cash prize?

10.SummaryEnglish: Nach dem erbitterten Kampf auf Rakuyou werden endlich die Vergangenheit und das wahre Ziel des unsterblichen Naraku-Anführers Utsuro enthüllt. Indem er die Altana-Reserven mehrerer Planeten korrumpiert hat, hat Utsuro erfolgreich das Eingreifen des größten Feindes der Tendoshuu ausgelöst: die Altana-Befreiungsarmee. Mit der Erde als Hauptschlachtfeld in diesem interplanetaren Krieg ist Utsuros Masterplan, den Planeten - und sich selbst - zu zerstören, fast abgeschlossen.

1.TitleEnglish: Try As You Might to Make a Natural Perm Go Away, It Will Always Return
1.SummaryEnglish: Utsuro's master plan is in full effect as Earth is taken over by the Altana Liberation Army. With Odd Jobs still not back from Rakuyo, the residents of Kabuki District have a hard time adjusting to life as a colony.

2.TitleEnglish: Flavoring Is Best in Small Quantities
2.SummaryEnglish: Katsura, Sakamoto, and Nobunobu arrive at the S.S. Heavenly Bird and try to bring the Liberation Army to the negotiating table. Meanwhile, the various factions in Edo begin to make their move.

3.TitleEnglish: A Delinquent's Kid Has Long Neck Hair
3.SummaryEnglish: With the Odd Jobs looking for the Tendoshu, things heat up on the Liberation Army's main ship. Shijaku has promised his cooperation to Nobunobu, but now he must convince his comrades.

4.TitleEnglish: The Line Between Tenacious and Annoying Is Paper-Thin
4.SummaryEnglish: The encounter with Utsuro leaves Gintoki feeling more helpless than ever before. That's when he receives a very powerful reminder.

5.TitleEnglish: Geezers Carve the Things They Shouldn't Forget into Their Wrinkles
5.SummaryEnglish: The return of some familiar faces breathes new life into Earth's resistance, but they're as troublesome as they've always been! And when the Liberation Army brings out its big guns, it's up to Gengai to respond.

6.TitleEnglish: Machines That Pick Up Useless Habits Are Called People
6.SummaryEnglish: The machines have done their part and left Earth's future in the hands of humanity. But Gengai's cannon has also painted a huge target on the Kabuki Distruct, and the Liberation Army immediately marches toward it.

7.TitleEnglish: Men Must Live Not Long or Thick, but Hard
7.SummaryEnglish: Prince Hata's past is revealed along with the history of Planet Okoku. Can Katsura and Hasegawa really get them on Earth's side?

8.TitleEnglish: Ogres Are Weak Against Tiny Heroes Like the Inch-High Samurai
8.SummaryEnglish: The Kabuki District is under siege, and the fearsome Dakini race arrive on the scene. How can the District and its residents cope with this onslaught?

9.TitleEnglish: Bragging About Your Own Heroic Deeds Will Make People Hate You, So Make Others Do It For You
9.SummaryEnglish: The Shinra finally make their move and look to capture the creator of the virus cannon with their underhand tactics. But right as things get desperate, the "boss" of the Kabuki District intervenes

10.TitleEnglish: Jump and Power Creep Go Hand-in-Hand
10.SummaryEnglish: Under the leadership of the Kabuki District's Four Devas, the residents are beginning to drive out the enemies inside the town. However, they still have to deal with Ougai, the leader of the Dakini force.

11.TitleEnglish: Peace and Destruction Are Two Sides of the Same Coin
11.SummaryEnglish: After successfully driving the Liberation Army out of the Kabuki District, its residents enjoy a well-earned break. However, they know that the peace won't last for long.

12.TitleEnglish: Bushido Is Found One Second Before Death
12.SummaryEnglish: Gengai has gone missing, and Ensho has brought out his trump card. How can the Odd Jobs, the Shinsengumi, Katsura, Sakamoto, and Nobunobu get out of this desperate situation?

13.SummaryEnglish: The other half of silver soul arc starts.

14.TitleEnglish: Rabbits Jump High on Moonlit Nights
14.SummaryEnglish: Kagura senses Yato presence and runs off to stop them, and she has some unexpected backup!

15.SummaryEnglish: With the Earth's Altana reserves going berserk, and the Flame of Kagutsuchi nearly ready to fire, the Kiheitai are left with hard choices to make in order to prevent the destruction of Earth and the entire galaxy.

16.TitleEnglish: Do something uncharacteristic, and something uncharacteristic will happen
16.SummaryEnglish: Ensho's past is revealed, and Takasugi revolves to make a final stand to take him down.

17.SummaryEnglish: The story shifts back to Earth, where Utsuro has made the Altana ley lines go berserk. Some old, familiar faces rise up to combat it.

18.TitleEnglish: The Unemployed Cannot Be Stained By Anything
18.SummaryEnglish: Shijaku presents his brother, Prince Hata, with an impossible choice. As he finally makes his decision, Hasegawa suggests a different solution.

19.TitleEnglish: Always Hold On to Your Trump Cards
19.SummaryEnglish: As Sadaharu fights to quell the rampaging ley lines, the gang puts it all on the line to take down Utsuro.

20.SummaryEnglish: The Odd Jobs are joined by old friends in their battle to save the Earth. Utsuro is surprised by a side of humanity he had never seen before.

21.SummaryEnglish: Two years have passed, and Gintoki has shut down the Odd Jobs business and gone off to do something only he can do. Shinpachi has other ideas, though.

22.SummaryEnglish: Shinpachi is forced into a plot to assassinate the inaugural prime minister of Japan, Donald Zuramp!

23.TitleEnglish: Two in Girl Years Is Equal to Ten in Man Years
23.SummaryEnglish: Okita and Kagura's daughter (?) rekindle their rivalry, and Okita senses something is off. Meanwhile, Gintoki runs into an old friend.

24.SummaryEnglish: Gintoki and Takasugi reveal to each other what they've been doing over the past two years, and decide to go save the one thing they never managed to save in the past: their teacher.

25.SummaryEnglish: Now back in Edo, Gintoki doesn't know how to face his old friends, and so he decides to try and avoid running into any of them. However, that won't be easy.

26.TitleEnglish: There Are Lines Even Villains Can't Cross
26.SummaryEnglish: Having caught Takasugi Shinsfake, the ladies' gang decides to teach him a lesson and try and get him to spill the beans on where Gintoki is. How will Shinsfake survive this?
